content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
“Dungeon Defenders... really burrows into your brain and refuses to leave.” 9 out of 10 – EGM
An ancient evil has been unleashed on the land of Etheria and it’s up to you to defend it in this online tower defense action RPG! Create your own hero from one of four distinct classes. Plan your defenses and fight through wave upon wave of enemies in an epic loot fest as you forge equipment, customize and level your character and more! Collect, train and trade a variety of pets with your friends. Take your character through multiple difficulty modes and challenge/survival missions to earn more experience and even better treasure. To top it off, you can do all of this with up to 4 friends on the same console (splitscreen)! With the content of a full retail release and graphics powered by Unreal Engine 3, Dungeon Defenders is one of the true AAA downloadable titles available on PlayStation®Network.
PlayStation®Move motion controller and 3D support!

PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
